column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Diy_coref|
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Diy_coref_re|BT_webanno.custom.Diy_coref
#Text=[0005] A related room illumination lamp described in JP-A-2005-238966, for example, is a room illumination lamp of the above described type.
#Text=[0006] As is shown in FIG. 22, the related room illumination lamp is provided with a designed member 202 and a functional member 204.
#Text=The designed member 202 is configured by fixing a lens 210 to a housing 200A.
#Text=The housing 200A is attachable to an opening 101 of an interior member 100.
#Text=An example of the interior member 100 is a ceiling to which the illumination lamp is attached.
#Text=The functional member 204 is provided with a light source 203.
#Text=The light source 203 is a filament which emits light having a predetermined chromaticity.
#Text=The functional member 204 is supported by the designed member 202 and disposed at a back side of the interior member 100.
#Text=The functional member 204 can be assembled together with the designed member 202 integrally.
#Text=[0007] In the above reviewed related room illumination lamp, however, the light source 203 is particularly fragile because of its material characteristics.
#Text=Therefore, it is worried that the light source 203 is broken by a force applied during transportation from a manufacturing stage to an assembling stage.
#Text=To deal with this problem, there is a related countermeasure.
#Text=In the related countermeasure, a designed member 202 and a functional member 204 are not assembled together but are left as separate component parts before transportation.
#Text=As shown in FIG. 23, for example, a protection cover 300 specialized for protecting the light source 203 covers the light source provided on the functional member 204.

#Text=[0008] This light source protection cover 300 is removed after the transportation since the protection cover 300 is so large that the protection cover 300 hinders the assembling the functional member 204 with the designed member 202 integrally.

#Text=Because of the above, as shown in FIG. 22, the functional member 204 is attached to the opening 101 of the interior member 100 of a vehicle while the fragile light source 203 is exposed to the outside in a bare condition.
#Text=Therefore, there is a risk that the light source 203 is contacted with something and is broken.

#Text=In addition, in a case where the light source 203 is broken due to a contact with the opening 101 of the interior member 100 or the like, there is a risk that the interior member 100 about the opening 101 of the vehicle is also damaged.
#Text=Related Art 2
